Your profile is available from the first tab of bottom menu. 
There you can find personal info provided during registration. 
 
Your Quests are available from the second tab of bottom menu. 
There you can create new Quests and specify target from your subscribers. 
 
From Menu tab you can access to your subscribers and subscribe to someone 
Also there you can log out from your account.
